title: A detective scrolled through social media. What he noticed helped catch a person wanted for shooting homeless men in 2 cities - CNN
content:

description: Capt. Kevin Kentish, a Queens native who now works with the Metropolitan Police Department in Washington, DC, was scrolling through his social media over the weekend when something caught his eye.
